entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers and flurries beginning late this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
